tab1.title1: <TextStyle.White>Welcome to Yggdrasil Gaming Community Ark:SA Cluster</>
tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.White>We really hope you enjoy playing on our servers.</>
<TextStyle.White>Please make sure you read our rules using the button below before playing.</>
<TextStyle.White>Please join Discord using the link button on the bottom of the screen and be sure to register within 7 days of playing on our servers.</>
<TextStyle.White>To learn more about the plugins on our server use the 'Chat Commands' button above to read about the commands available.</>
<TextStyle.White>Our servers are supported by donations from the community. We like to say a big thankyou to members of our community that donate and become VIP members with some rewards and benefits. If you would like to donate or want to know more about donating then please click the 'Donation Store' button below which will take you to the store page.</>

<TextStyle.White>We hope you enjoy playing on our servers and being a part of the community :) </>
